entries.source: Chat Edit: 'Okay lets make a simple custom theme switcher for wofi. i have all my wallpapers stored in "/home/avery/Wallpapers/", i just want the theme switcher menu to display the wallpapers i have there and when i select one it does the command "sww img <path to the selected image> --transition-fps 60 --transition-step 255 --transition-type grow'
Chat Edit: 'Okay thats nice! the only issue is that there are no previews for the wallpapers, id like there to be big previews and names under instead of the "list"'

Chat Edit: 'Yeahh i think we might bypass that by making the previews seem like icons to wofi? heres a script i found on forums that maybe could help:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

tmp_dir="/tmp/cliphist"
rm -rf "$tmp_dir"

if [[ -n "$1" ]]; then
    cliphist decode <<<"$1" | wl-copy
    exit
fi

mkdir -p "$tmp_dir"

read -r -d '' prog <<EOF
/^[0-9]+\s<meta http-equiv=/ { next }
match(\$0, /^([0-9]+)\s(\[\[\s)?binary.*(jpg|jpeg|png|bmp)/, grp) {
    system("echo " grp[1] "\\\\\t | cliphist decode >$tmp_dir/"grp[1]"."grp[3])
    print \$0"\0icon\x1f$tmp_dir/"grp[1]"."grp[3]
    next
}
1
EOF
cliphist list | gawk "$prog"
'

                      ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
                      errread, errwrite)
                      ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

               ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
ValueError: embedded null byte'
Chat Edit: 'okay so maybe Try running wofi with --show dmenu --allow-images to force image support.'

Chat Edit: 'Instead of an image i see "/home/avery/Wallpapers/wallhaven-2e2xyx.jpg" and in the console theres errors: (wofi:9220): Gtk-WARNING **: 19:16:45.285: Failed to set text '/home/avery/Wallpapers/wallhaven-2e2xyx.jpg' from markup due to error parsing markup: Unknown tag 'img' on line 1 char 22 So maybe Try running wofi with --show dmenu --allow-images to force image support.'
Chat Edit: 'Okay, can i make it not do the animation from the middle of both screens? id like it to run the animation from a random place'
Chat Edit: 'no need to use pyautogui, just hard code 2560x14440 '

Chat Edit: 'error: invalid value '1515 445' for '--transition-pos <TRANSITION_POS>': Invalid position keyword: 1515 445

For more information, try '--help'.'
Chat Edit: 'Okay, lets change it and add --transition-pos x,y (x and y are numbers in range from 0 to 1) and make it random'
